item.title: Into the Fediverse
item.description: By now you have most likely heard of the Fediverse. Lately it has gained momentum due to the acquisition of Twitter and its subsequent demise, causing so-called ‘migrations’ to other platforms. Among them, Mastodon, one small part of the Fediverse. If not, or you want to learn more, see below. The Rchaeology community now has a Mastodon account and a chat on Element/Matrix (Slack alternative). Both are hosted on archaeo.social. Both are open source!
